message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to offer you a competitive price of $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a great deal considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
